sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词有"代表，代理人"之意。
means: delegate ： 指一般被派参加某一会议的代表。
deputy ： 指上级授权代理行事的代表，特指被选择为执行全部或部分公务的人。
representative ： 一般指被选举或委派代表某人或一些人或某个较大团体的人，其职务有时是较长期的。
agent ： 普通用词，通常指经授权代理另一个人或团体，或指在双方之间代表一方起中间作用的人。
substitute ： 主要强调某人或某物可以用来代替别的人或物的作用。

sentence.Network_en: Professor Baker is unacquainted with the idea of representative democracy.
sentence.Network_cn: 贝克教授并不熟悉“代议制民主”这一思想。

sentence.Network_en: Voters are interested in the representative's ability to bring home the bacon.
sentence.Network_cn: 选民感兴趣的是代表能否兑现承诺。

sentence.Network_en: "The community are getting impatient," said a representative of the Residents' Association.
sentence.Network_cn: “社区居民开始不耐烦了，”居民协会的一位代表说。

representative section 代表性剖面representative 代表人-

list.abs: Liu style is a calligraphy style represented by Liu Gongquan of the Tang dynasty ., 柳体是以唐朝柳公权书法为代表的字体.
1. 代表性（Representativeness）指的是人们在预测未来的时候，倾向于把过去的表现作为判断的依据。具体有两种不同的倾向。
典字的解释-... ... 典型环境〖 specificcircumstance〗 典型性〖 representativeness;typicalness〗 典型性格〖 modelindividuality〗.
人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... knowledgeable 聪明的 represent 表现 come up with 提出.
人教版九年级英语单词表_百度文库 ... knowledgeable 知识渊博的 represent 代表；表示 let...down... 使…失望.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French representatif, -ive or medieval Latin repraesentativus, from the verb repraesentare 'exhibit' (see represent)

entry.def: A representative is a person who has been chosen to act or make decisions on behalf of another person or a group of people.

example.ex: Employees from each department elect a representative.
example.tran: 每个部门的员工选举一名代表。

entry.def: A representative is a person whose job is to sell a company's products or services, especially by travelling round and visiting other companies.

example.ex: She had a stressful job as a sales representative.
example.tran: 作为一名销售代表，她的工作压力很大。

entry.tran: 由代表组成的;代议制的
entry.def: A representative group consists of a small number of people who have been chosen to make decisions on behalf of a larger group.

example.ex: The new head of state should be chosen by an 87 member representative council.
example.tran: 新的国家元首应该由包括87名成员的代表委员会选出。
代议制政府的各个机构

entry.def: Someone who is typical of the group to which they belong can be described as representative .

example.ex: He was in no way representative of dog-trainers in general.
example.tran: 他远不是一般意义上的驯狗师。
相当典型的成年人群体

entry.def: In the United States, a Representative is a member of the House of Representatives, the less powerful of the two parts of Congress.

means.word_mean: 2. an advocate who represents someone else's policy or purpose;

sentences.sentence: "the meeting was attended by spokespersons for all the major organs of government"

means.word_mean: 3. a member of the United States House of Representatives
4. an item of information that is representative of a type;

sentences.sentence: "this patient provides a typical example of the syndrome"
"the bald eagle is representative of the United States"

means.word_mean: 3. being or characteristic of government by representation in which citizens exercise power through elected officers and representatives;

sentences.sentence: "representative government as defined by Abraham Lincoln is government of the people, by the people, for the people"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……倾向(性质)的;……的"; 2. 表名词,"人或物等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: affirm肯定+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赞成的,肯定的
argument争论+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.爱争论的,好辩论的
authority权威,威信+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.权威性的,命令式的
e出+voc喊+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→把感情喊出来
figu形体,用形象比喻+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.比喻的,借喻的
lucr钱+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.赚钱的,有利可图的
represent代表+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.典型的,有代表性的
talk讲话+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.罗嗦的
preserve保存+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.防腐的,防腐剂
sed坐+ative有……倾向(性质)的;……的→adj.&n.[药物]镇静的,镇静剂
represent描述,表示+ative人或物等→n.代表

Sentence.sentence: Well, at 3:30, you're seeing our sales representative there and then you're free till the evening.
Since a union representative visited our company to inform us about our rights and protections.
The management and union representatives reached an agreement.

sentences.en: I sent my representative to the meeting.
He is a representative for a large steel company.
sentences.cn: 他是一家大型钢铁公司的代理人。
